title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.15 - Responsibility to employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.15 - Responsibility to employees

State Regulations

Every excavator subject to the provisions of this Part
shall make certain that all of his or her employees directly involved in
excavation or demolition are thoroughly familiar with the applicable provisions
of this Part and especially the provisions of this Subpart relating to their
safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-3.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
